subject: Fix gesture handling and TypeScript error for message interactions
body:
Improve gesture reliability on mobile by using onFinalize with success checks and Gesture.Exclusive composition. Fix JSX.Element type error in MessageActionSheet.

Changes:
- Use onFinalize instead of onEnd for tap and long-press gestures
- Add shouldCancelWhenOutside(true) to prevent gestures from completing when finger moves away
- Increase tap maxDuration to 400ms and long-press minDuration to 500ms for more deliberate interactions
- Add activeOffsetX and failOffsetY to pan gesture to require intentional horizontal movement
- Change gesture composition from Gesture.Race to Gesture.Exclusive for cleaner gesture recognition
- Add statusBarTranslucent and onStartShouldSetResponder to MessageActionSheet modal
- Fix return type from JSX.Element to React.JSX.Element in MessageActionSheet

These changes prevent accidental action triggers and ensure gestures only complete when intended, improving the mobile UX.
title: Fix gesture handling and TypeScript error for message interactions
